00043 bool allow_unregistered = false;

00045 Desc *cmdline_descp = NULL;
00046 Desc *cmdline_hidden_descp = NULL;
00047 PositionalDesc *cmdline_positional_descp = NULL;
00048 Desc *file_descp = NULL;
00049 
00050 int line_length() {
00051   int n = System::term_info().num_cols;
00052   return n > 0 ? n : 80;
00053 }
00054 
00055 String usage_str(const char *usage) {
00056   if (!usage)
00057     usage = "Usage: %s [options]\n\nOptions";
00058 
00059   if (strstr(usage, "%s"))
00060     return format(usage, System::exe_name.c_str());
00061 
00062   return usage;
00063 }
00064 
00065 Desc &cmdline_desc(const char *usage) {
00066   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00067 
00068   if (!cmdline_descp)
00069     cmdline_descp = new Desc(usage_str(usage), line_length());
00070 
00071   return *cmdline_descp;
00072 }
00073 
00074 Desc &cmdline_hidden_desc() {
00075   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00076 
00077   if (!cmdline_hidden_descp)
00078     cmdline_hidden_descp = new Desc();
00079 
00080   return *cmdline_hidden_descp;
00081 }
00082 
00083 PositionalDesc &cmdline_positional_desc() {
00084   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00085 
00086   if (!cmdline_positional_descp)
00087     cmdline_positional_descp = new PositionalDesc();
00088 
00089   return *cmdline_positional_descp;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void cmdline_desc(const Desc &desc) {
00093   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00094 
00095   if (cmdline_descp)
00096     delete cmdline_descp;
00097 
00098   cmdline_descp = new Desc(desc);
00099 }
00100 
00101 Desc &file_desc(const char *usage) {
00102   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00103 
00104   if (!file_descp)
00105     file_descp = new Desc(usage ? usage : "Config Properties", line_length());
00106 
00107   return *file_descp;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void file_desc(const Desc &desc) {
00111   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00112 
00113   if (file_descp)
00114     delete file_descp;
00115 
00116   file_descp = new Desc(desc);
00117 }

00318 
00319 void parse_args(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00320   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00321 
00322   HT_TRY("parsing init arguments",
00323     properties->parse_args(argc, argv, cmdline_desc(), cmdline_hidden_descp,
00324                            cmdline_positional_descp, allow_unregistered));
00325   // some built-in behavior
00326   if (has("help")) {
00327     std::cout << cmdline_desc() << std::flush;
00328     _exit(0);
00329   }
00330 
00331   if (has("help-config")) {
00332     std::cout << file_desc() << std::flush;
00333     _exit(0);
00334   }
00335 
00336   if (has("version")) {
00337     std::cout << version() << std::endl;
00338     _exit(0);
00339   }
00340 
00341   Path defaultcfg(System::install_dir);
00342   defaultcfg /= "conf/hypertable.cfg";
00343   filename = get("config", defaultcfg.string());
00344 
00345   // Only try to parse config file if it exists or not default
00346   if (FileUtils::exists(filename)) {
00347     parse_file(filename, cmdline_hidden_desc());
00348     file_loaded = true;
00349   }
00350   else if (filename != defaultcfg)
00351     HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, filename);
00352 
00353   sync_aliases();       // call before use
00354 }
00355 
00356 void
00357 parse_file(const String &fname, const Desc &desc) {
00358   properties->load(fname, desc, allow_unregistered);
00359 }
00360 
00361 void alias(const String &cmdline_opt, const String &file_opt, bool overwrite) {
00362   properties->alias(cmdline_opt, file_opt, overwrite);
00363 }
00364 
00365 void sync_aliases() {
00366   properties->sync_aliases();
00367 }
00368 
00369 void init_default_actions() {
00370   String loglevel = get_str("logging-level");
00371   bool verbose = get_bool("verbose");
00372 
00373   if (verbose && get_bool("quiet")) {
00374     verbose = false;
00375     properties->set("verbose", false);
00376   }
00377   if (get_bool("debug")) {
00378     loglevel = "debug";
00379     properties->set("logging-level", loglevel);
00380   }
00381 
00382   if (loglevel == "info")
00383     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::INFO);
00384   else if (loglevel == "debug")
00385     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::DEBUG);
00386   else if (loglevel == "notice")
00387     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::NOTICE);
00388   else if (loglevel == "warn")
00389     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::WARN);
00390   else if (loglevel == "error")
00391     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::ERROR);
00392   else if (loglevel == "crit")
00393     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::CRIT);
00394   else if (loglevel == "alert")
00395     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::ALERT);
00396   else if (loglevel == "fatal")
00397     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::FATAL);
00398   else {
00399     HT_ERROR_OUT << "unknown logging level: "<< loglevel << HT_END;
00400     _exit(0);
00401   }
00402   if (verbose) {
00403     HT_NOTICE_OUT <<"Initializing "<< System::exe_name <<" ("<< version()
00404                   <<")..." << HT_END;
00405   }
00406 }
00407 
00408 bool allow_unregistered_options(bool choice) {
00409   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00410   bool old = allow_unregistered;
00411   allow_unregistered = choice;
00412   return old;
00413 }
00414 
00415 bool allow_unregistered_options() {
00416   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00417   return allow_unregistered;
00418 }
